abilities.name: Aftershock
abilities.description: EQUIP a fusion charge. FIRE the charge to set a slow-acting burst through the wall. The burst does heavy damage to anyone caught in its area.

abilities.name: Flashpoint
abilities.description: EQUIP a blind charge. FIRE the charge to set a fast-acting burst through the wall. The charge detonates to blind all players looking at it.

abilities.name: Fault Line
abilities.description: EQUIP a seismic blast. HOLD FIRE to increase the distance. RELEASE to set off the quake, dazing all players in its zone and in a line up to the zone.

abilities.name: Rolling Thunder
abilities.description: EQUIP a Seismic Charge. FIRE to send a cascading quake through all terrain in a large cone. The quake dazes and knocks up anyone caught in it.

abilities.name: Stim Beacon
abilities.description: EQUIP a stim beacon. FIRE to toss the stim beacon in front of Brimstone. Upon landing, the stim beacon will create a field that grants players RapidFire.

abilities.name: Incendiary
abilities.description: EQUIP an incendiary grenade launcher. FIRE to launch a grenade that detonates as it comes to a rest on the floor, creating a lingering fire zone that damages players within the zone.

abilities.name: Sky Smoke
abilities.description: EQUIP a tactical map. FIRE to set locations where Brimstone's smoke clouds will land. ALTERNATE FIRE to confirm, launching long-lasting smoke clouds that block vision in the selected area.

abilities.name: Orbital Strike
abilities.description: EQUIP a tactical map. FIRE to launch a lingering orbital strike laster at the selected location, dealing high damage-over-time to players caught in the selected area.

insights.tip: A well placed [C] Trapwire between high-traffic areas is perfect for informing your team of enemy rotations.
While [X] Neural Theft grants vision of enemy players, it only snapshots their location at the time, not updating if they move.
[E] Spycam becomes far more valuable on defense as it allows you to exist as a second pair of eyes on a bombsite if your teammate(s) holding that site dies.

abilities.name: Trapwire
abilities.description: EQUIP a trapwire. FIRE to place a desctuctible and covert tripwire at the targeted location, creating a line that spans between the placed location and the wall opposite. Enemy players who cross a tripwire will be tethered, and dazed after a short period if they do not destroy the device in time. This ability can be picked up to be REDEPLOYED.

abilities.name: Cyber Cage
abilities.description: EQUIP a cyber cage. FIRE to toss the cyber cage in front of Cypher. ACTIVATE to create a zone that blocks vision and slows enemies who pass through it.

abilities.name: Spycam
abilities.description: EQUIP a spycam. FIRE to place the spycam at the targeted location. RE-USE this ability to take control of the camera's view. While in control of the camera, FIRE to shoot a marking dart. This dart will reveal the location of any player struck by the dart.
abilities.cost: Placeable once per round. Can be picked up and re-placed.

abilities.name: Neural Theft
abilities.description: INSTANTLY use on a dead enemy player in your crosshairs to reveal the location of all living enemy players.

insights.tip: For additional mobilty, Jett can combo a [Q] Updraft into [E] Tailwind for extended elevation traversal.
Jett's [Q] Updraft is most commonly used to boost to the top of boxes for advantageous gunfights where the opposing team won't expect you.
Jett has the passive ability to float on descent after jumping by holding Spacebar. This allows her to traverse between some elevated positions.
insights.extra: Note that your aim is still inaccurate during floating.

abilities.name: Cloudburst
abilities.description: INSTANTLY throw a projectile that expands into a brief vision-blocking cloud on impact with a surfact. HOLD the ability key to curve the smoke in the direction of your crosshair.

abilities.name: Updraft
abilities.description: INSTANTLY propel Jett high into the air.

abilities.name: Tailwind
abilities.description: INSTANTLY propel Jett in the direction she is moving. If Jett is standing still she will propel forward.
abilities.cost: Free, once per round. Refreshed on 2 kills.

abilities.name: Blade Storm
abilities.description: EQUIP a set of highly accurate throwing knives that recharge on killing an opponent. FIRE to throw a single knife at your target. ALTERNATE FIRE to throw all remaining daggers at your target.

insights.tip: If you cast [E] Cark Cover before casting [X] From the Shadows, you can see the shroud on the map, allowing you to teleport into it safely without being seen.
[E] Dark Cover can be cast through walls. Keep an eye on the minimap while charging as it will show you the location of where the shroud will appear.
insights.extra: This is extra useful at the start of a round to shroud an ult orb or hallway.

insights.tip: Omen's [C] Shrouded Step is great for catching people off-guard from unexpected locations like the top of boxes, corners, and otherwise impossible to cross sight lines.
insights.extra: Never cast this into an open sight line, the recovery animation leaves you vulnerable.

insights.tip: A great way to take an advantageous fight is prepping your entry with a [Q] Paranoia to blind the enemy first.

abilities.name: Shrouded Step
abilities.description: EQUIP a shadow walk ability and see its range indicator. FIRE to begin a brief channel, then teleport to the marked location.

abilities.name: Paranoia
abilities.description: INSTANTLY fire a shadow projectile forward, briefly reducing the vision range of all players it touches. This projectile can pass straight through walls.

abilities.name: Dark Cover
abilities.description: EQUIP a shadow orb and see its range indicator. FIRE to throw the shadow orb to the marked location, creating a long-lasting shadow sphere that blocks vision. HOLD ALTERNATE FIRE while targeting to move the marker further away. HOLD the ability key while targeting to move the marker closer.
abilities.cost: Free. 2 charges, 35s cooldown on charge refresh.

abilities.name: From the Shadows
abilities.description: EQUIP a tactical map. FIRE to begin teleporting to the selected location. While teleporting, Omen will appear as a Shade that can be destroyed by an enemy to cancel his teleport.

insights.tip: Phoenix's [X] Run it Back is the best entry-frag ability in the game. When you know where the enemy is and want to make a play, pop it and look to make at least a 1-for-1 trade.
Before peeking a dangerous sight line, prep your entry with a [Q] Curveball to briefly blind opponents so you get an easy first shot.
[E] Hot Hands also doubles as a heal for yourself. If you find yourself low after a fight, throw it at your feet to heal to full health.
insights.extra: Be mindful of where your teammates are, all abilites deal damage to them.

abilities.name: Blaze
abilities.description: EQUIP a flame wall. FIRE to create a line of flame that moves forward, creating a wall of fire that blocks vision and damages players passing through it. HOLD FIRE to bend the wall in the direction of your crosshair.

abilities.name: Curveball
abilities.description: EQUIP a flare orb that takes a curving path and detonates shortly after throwing. FIRE to curve the flare orb to the left, detonating and blinding any player who sees the orb. ALTERNATE FIRE to curve the flare orb to the right.

abilities.name: Hot Hands
abilities.description: EQUIP a fireball. FIRE to throw a fireball that explodes after a set amount of time or upon hitting the ground, creating a lingering fire zone that damages enemies.
abilities.cost: Free, once per round. Refreshed on 2 kills.

abilities.name: Run it Back
abilities.description: INSTANTLY place a marker at Phoenix's location. while this ability is active, dying or allowing the timer to expire will end this ability and bring Phoenix back to this location with full health.

abilities.name: Boom Bot
abilities.description: EQUIP a Boom Bot. FIRE will deploy the bot, causing it to travel in a straight line on the ground, bouncing off walls. The Boom Bot will lock on to any enemies in it frontal cone and chase them, exploding for heavy damage if it reaches them.

abilities.name: Blast Pack
abilities.description: INSTANTLY throw a Blast Pack that will stick to surfaces. RE-USE the ability after deployment to detonate, damaging and moving anything hit.

abilities.name: Paint Shells
abilities.description: EQUIP a cluster grenade. FIRE to throw the grenade, which does damage and creates sub-munitions, each doing damage to anyone in their range.
abilities.cost: 1 Free per round. Recharge on 2 kills.

abilities.name: Showstopper
abilities.description: EQUIP a rocket launcher. FIRE shoots a rocket that does massive area damage on contact with anything.

abilities.name: Leer
abilities.description: EQUIP an ethereal destructible eye. ACTIVATE to cast the eye a short distance forward. The eye will Nearsight all enemies who look at it.

abilities.name: Devour
abilities.description: Enemies killed by Reyna leave behind Soul Orbs that last 3 seconds. INSTANTLY consume a nearby soul orb, rapidly healing for a short duration. Health gained through this skill exceeding 100 will decay over time. If EMPRESS is active, this skill will automatically cast and not consume the orb.

abilities.name: Dismiss
abilities.description: INSTANTLY consume a nearby soul orb, becoming intangible for a short duration. If EMPRESS is active, also become invisible.

abilities.name: Empress
abilities.description: INSTANTLY enter a frenzy, increasing firing speed, equip and reload speed dramatically. Scoring a kill renews the duration.

abilities.name: Barrier Orb
abilities.description: EQUIP a barrier orb. FIRE places a solid wall. ALT FIRE rotates the targeter.

abilities.name: Slow Orb
abilities.description: EQUIP a slowing orb. FIRE to throw a slowing orb forward that detonates upon landing, creating a lingering field that slows players caught inside of it.

abilities.name: Healing Orb
abilities.description: EQUIP a healing orb. FIRE with your crosshairs over a damaged ally to activate a heal-over-time on them. ALT FIRE while Sage is damaged to activate a self heal-over-time.

abilities.name: Resurrection
abilities.description: EQUIP a resurrection ability. FIRE with your crosshairs placed over a dead ally to begin resurrecting them. After a brief channel, the ally will be brought back to life with full health.

abilities.name: Owl Drone
abilities.description: EQUIP an owl drone. FIRE to deploy and take control of movement of the drone. While in control of the drone, FIRE to shoot a marking dart. This dart will reveal the location of any player struck by the dart.

abilities.name: Shock Bolt
abilities.description: EQUIP a bow with a shock bolt. FIRE to send the explosive bolt forward, detonating upon collision and damaging players nearby. HOLD FIRE to extend the range of teh projectile. ALTERNATE FIRE to add up to two bounces to this arrow.

abilities.name: Recon Bolt
abilities.description: EQUIP a bow with recon boly. FIRE to send the recon bolt forward, activating upon collision and revealing the location of nearby enemies caught in the line of sight of the bolt. Enemies can destroy this bolt. HOLD FIRE to extend the range of the projective. ALTERNATE FIRE to add up to two bounces to this arrow.

abilities.name: Hunter’s Fury
abilities.description: EQUIP a bow with three long-range, wall-piercing energy blasts. FIRE to release an energy blast in a line in front of Sova, dealing damage and revealing the location of enemies caught in the line. This ability can be RE-USED up to two more times while the ability timer is active.

abilities.name: Snake Bite
abilities.description: EQUIP a chemical launcher. FIRE to launch a canister that shatters upon hitting the floor, creating a lingering chemical zone that damages and slows enemies.

abilities.name: Poison Cloud
abilities.description: EQUiP a gas emitter. FIRE to throw the emitter that perpetually remains throughout the round. RE-USE the ability to create a toxic gas cloud at the cost of fuel. This ability can be RE-USED more than once and can be picked up to be REDEPLOYED.

abilities.name: Toxic Screen
abilities.description: EQUIP a gas emitter launcher. FIRE to deploy a long line of gas emitters. RE-USE the ability to create a tall wall of toxic gas at the cost of fuel. This ability can be RE-USED more than once.

abilities.name: Viper’s Pit
abilities.description: EQUIP a chemical sprayer. FIRE to spray a chemical cloud in all directions around Viper, creating a large cloud that reduces the vision range and maximum health of players inside of it.
